remarks: Module homomorphism depends only on the module attributes of structures.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Oct-2015.)
statement:
lmhmpropd.a $e |- ( ph -> B = ( Base ` J ) ) $.
lmhmpropd.b $e |- ( ph -> C = ( Base ` K ) ) $.
lmhmpropd.c $e |- ( ph -> B = ( Base ` L ) ) $.
lmhmpropd.d $e |- ( ph -> C = ( Base ` M ) ) $.
lmhmpropd.1 $e |- ( ph -> F = ( Scalar ` J ) ) $.
lmhmpropd.2 $e |- ( ph -> G = ( Scalar ` K ) ) $.
lmhmpropd.3 $e |- ( ph -> F = ( Scalar ` L ) ) $.
lmhmpropd.4 $e |- ( ph -> G = ( Scalar ` M ) ) $.
lmhmpropd.p $e |- P = ( Base ` F ) $.
lmhmpropd.q $e |- Q = ( Base ` G ) $.
lmhmpropd.e $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. B /\ y e. B ) ) -> ( x ( +g ` J ) y ) = ( x ( +g ` L ) y ) ) $.
lmhmpropd.f $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. C /\ y e. C ) ) -> ( x ( +g ` K ) y ) = ( x ( +g ` M ) y ) ) $.
lmhmpropd.g $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. P /\ y e. B ) ) -> ( x ( .s ` J ) y ) = ( x ( .s ` L ) y ) ) $.
lmhmpropd.h $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. Q /\ y e. C ) ) -> ( x ( .s ` K ) y ) = ( x ( .s ` M ) y ) ) $.
lmhmpropd $p |- ( ph -> ( J LMHom K ) = ( L LMHom M ) ) $.
$d B x y $.
$d C x y $.
$d J x y $.
$d K x y $.
$d L x y $.
$d M x y $.
$d P x y $.
$d Q x y $.
$d ph x y $.
